INSERT INTO MAISON_CONTENT (SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, DT, FILE_PATH, C_FLAG , ID) VALUES ((select max(seq) from maison_content)+1, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{file_path}, #{c_flag}, #{id} )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DECODE(#{baseDate}, 'TODAY', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{baseDate}))-2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATE1 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DECODE(#{baseDate}, 'TODAY', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{baseDate}))-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATE2 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DECODE(#{baseDate}, 'TODAY', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{baseDate}))+0, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATE3 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DECODE(#{baseDate}, 'TODAY', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{baseDate}))+1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATE4 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DECODE(#{baseDate}, 'TODAY', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{baseDate}))+2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DATE5 FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MAISON_CONTENT WHERE SEQ=#{seq} AND C_FLAG='D'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAISON_CONTENT (SEQ, TITLE, DT, CONDITION, CONTENT, C_FLAG, ID ) VALUES ((select max(seq) from maison_content)+1, #{title}, #{dt}, #{condition}, #{content}, #{c_flag}, #{id})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS "total_content" , CEIL(COUNT(*) / 50) AS "group_page" , TO_NUMBER(#{now_page}) AS "now_page" , CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{now_page})-10 < 0 THEN 1 ELSE TO_NUMBER(CONCAT(SUBSTR(#{now_page}, 1,LENGTH(#{now_page})-1),'1')) END AS "start_page" , CASE WHEN CEIL(COUNT(*) / 5) - CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{now_page})-10 < 0 THEN TO_CHAR(1) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTR(#{now_page}, 1,LENGTH(#{now_page})-1),'1') END > 10 THEN CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{now_page})-10 < 0 THEN TO_CHAR(1) ELSE CONCAT(SUBSTR(#{now_page}, 1,LENGTH(#{now_page})-1),'1') END + 9 ELSE CEIL(COUNT(*) / 5) END AS "end_page" , CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{now_page}) - 1 <= 0 THEN NULL ELSE TO_NUMBER(#{now_page}) - 1 END AS "pre_page" , CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{now_page}) = ROUND(CEIL(COUNT(*) / 5)) THEN NULL ELSE TO_NUMBER(#{now_page}) + 1 END AS "next_page" , CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{now_page}) * 5 < COUNT(*) THEN 5 ELSE MOD(COUNT(*), 5) END AS "content_cnt" , (TO_NUMBER(#{now_page})*5)-4 AS "start_content" , CASE WHEN (TO_NUMBER(#{now_page})*5)-4 = COUNT(*) THEN (TO_NUMBER(#{now_page})*5)-4 ELSE (((TO_NUMBER(#{now_page})*5)-4) + CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{now_page}) * 5 < COUNT(*) THEN 5 ELSE MOD(COUNT(*), 5) END) - 1 END AS "end_content" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, C.* FROM MAISON_CONTENT C WHERE C_FLAG = 'U' AND ID = #{id})
